definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: With all the variety and adventure, Able Seaman Green said she enjoyed her work.
sentences.chinese: 面對變化和冒險，二等兵格林說她非常喜歡她的工作。

sentences.english: The very major problem that Chinese mathematics faces is lack of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 當今中國數學界面對的大難，便是缺乏領導者。

sentences.english: L/C Payment problem is becoming serious to each bank.
sentences.chinese: 信用證墊款問題是各銀行面對的日趨嚴重的一個問題。

sentences.english: True extremely not easily Huan Yao brave the life disturbances facing.
sentences.chinese: 人生的風風雨雨真的很不容易還要勇敢的面對。

sentences.english: The Chinese people faced this disaster with compassion and courage.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民用愛心和勇氣來面對這場災難。

sentences.english: Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 別推下來，但使用面對身體來驅動頭向前。

sentences.english: The reward for facing fear is that you get to be fully alive.
sentences.chinese: 面對恐懼的獎勵就是你變得完全的鮮活了。

sentences.english: Face the light or lurk in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 面對光明，或藏伏在黑暗裏。

sentences.english: They've never been able to come to grips with the fact they're bankrupt.
sentences.chinese: 他們永遠也無法面對自己是破產者的事實。

sentences.english: As a pastor I face this all the time.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個牧師我一直面對着這種狀況。

sentences.english: She admits that her life is not a fairy tale and that she faces many challenges.
sentences.chinese: 她坦承她的生活並非童話般輕鬆，而要面對很多挑戰。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the enterprise-oriented social partnership is held back by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 其實，以企業爲主導的社會夥伴關係面對種種的限制。

sentences.english: And God says sooner or later you will have to face the consequences of your sin.
sentences.chinese: 神說或早或晚你都要面對罪的後果。

sentences.english: Love really need courage to face the tattle and prate.
sentences.chinese: 愛真的需要勇氣，來面對流言蜚語。

sentences.english: At present, food safety has become the global problem.
sentences.chinese: 當前，食品安全已成爲全球面對的難題。

sentences.english: Without the torment of the night's untruth.
sentences.chinese: 而不需面對夜晚虛僞的折磨。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal
